titles.title: To redesignate Saratoga National Historical Park as Saratoga National Battlefield Park.
To redesignate Saratoga National Historical Park as Saratoga National Battlefield Park.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-843.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 688.

action.text: Mr. Westerman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 8931.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

bill.summary: This bill renames the Saratoga National Historical Park as the Saratoga National Battlefield Park.
